optimization.optuna_optim¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

OptunaOptim

Class that contains all info for the whole optimization using optuna for one model and dataset.
class optimization.optuna_optim.OptunaOptim(save_dir, genotype_matrix_name, phenotype_matrix_name, phenotype, n_outerfolds, n_innerfolds, val_set_size_percentage, test_set_size_percentage, maf_percentage, n_trials, save_final_model, batch_size, n_epochs, task, current_model_name, dataset, start_time)¶

Class that contains all info for the whole optimization using optuna for one model and dataset.

## Attributes ##

task: str : ML task (regression or classification) depending on target variable current_model_name: str : name of the current model according to naming of .py file in package model dataset: base_dataset.Dataset : dataset to use for optimization run datasplit_subpath: str : subpath with datasplit info relevant for saving / naming base_path : str : base_path for save_path save_path: str : path for model and results storing study : optuna.study.Study : optuna study for optimization run current_best_val_result: float : the best validation result so far early_stopping_point: int : point at which early stopping occured (relevant for some models) user_input_params: dict : all params handed over to the constructor that are needed in the whole class

Parameters

  • save_dir (str) –

  • genotype_matrix_name (str) –

  • phenotype_matrix_name (str) –

  • phenotype (str) –

  • n_outerfolds (int) –

  • n_innerfolds (int) –

  • val_set_size_percentage (int) –

  • test_set_size_percentage (int) –

  • maf_percentage (int) –

  • n_trials (int) –

  • save_final_model (bool) –

  • batch_size (int) –

  • n_epochs (int) –

  • task (str) –

  • current_model_name (str) –

  • dataset (preprocess.base_dataset.Dataset) –

  • start_time (str) –

Create a new optuna study. :return: optuna study

Return type

optuna.study.Study

objective(self, trial, train_val_indices)¶

Objective function for optuna optimization that returns a score :param trial: trial of optuna for optimization :param train_val_indices: indices of train and validation sets :return: score of the current hyperparameter config

Parameters

  • train_val_indices (dict) –

Return type

float

Clean up things after an exception: delete unfitted model if it exists and update runtime csv :param trial_number: number of the trial :param trial_params: parameters of the trial
